titles.title: Public Safety Officers Flag Act
To ensure that a flag is furnished to drape the casket of each public safety officer killed in the line of duty.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 7/10/2003--Introduced. Public Safety Officers Flag Act - Directs: (1) the Secretary of Homeland Security to furnish a flag to drape the casket of each public safety officer killed in the line of duty; and (2) the flag to be given to the officer's next of kin after the burial.
